main.name: Bikram Samsohang
main.description: I am a Software engineer with 4 plus year of experience in Web Development and Testing (Manual & Automated)
main.bio: I am an IT personnel with an experience of more than 4 years in Web Development and Software Testing (Automation and Manual testing) in Nepalese IT industry. I am skilled in HTML, Javascript, Typescript, CSS, Angular JS, Angular, React, Node JS, Protractor, Karma and Jasmine.

education.description: Web development, Cloud, MEAN stack, MERN stack

work.title: Software Engineer Development in Test
work.description: Performing manual and automated tests on applications, writing e2e test scripts using protractor, cucumber, Karma & Jasmine.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Developing single page applications using Angular JS 1.6 and Angular 7.
